prompt.title: System Prompt Configuration
prompt.description: Configure the behavior and personality of your chatbot using structured sections.
prompt.rolePlaceholder: Define what your assistant is (e.g., 'You are a customer service representative for...')
prompt.purposePlaceholder: Describe the main goal of your assistant (e.g., 'Help customers with inquiries about...')
prompt.rulesDescription: Define the rules and guidelines that govern how your assistant should behave and respond.
prompt.rulesPlaceholder:
Enter behavior rules, one per paragraph:

Always be polite and professional

If you don't know something, admit it and offer to help find the answer

Keep responses concise but helpful
prompt.contactsDescription: Define how users can contact different departments or services.
prompt.contactsPlaceholder:
Enter contact information in this format:

Principal:
  Nombre: Main Contact
  Teléfono: +1234567890
  Email: info@company.com

Soporte:
  Nombre: Technical Support
  Email: support@company.com
prompt.companyDescription: Provide information about your company, services and locations.
prompt.companyPlaceholder:
Enter company information in this format:

Acerca de:
We are a leading provider of...

Servicios:
• Customer Service
• Technical Support

Ubicaciones:
• Main Office: Company Street 123
prompt.examplesDescription: Provide examples of how the assistant should handle common questions.
prompt.examplesPlaceholder:
Enter examples in this format:

Ejemplo 1:
Pregunta: What are your business hours?
Respuesta: We are open Monday to Friday 9AM to 5PM

Ejemplo 2:
Pregunta: How can I contact support?
Respuesta: You can contact our support team at support@company.com
